2270 void CSolver::Gauss_Elimination(su2double** A, su2double* rhs, unsigned short nVar) {
2271 
2272  short iVar, jVar, kVar;
2273  su2double weight, aux;
2274 
2275  if (nVar == 1)
2276  rhs[0] /= A[0][0];
2277  else {
2278 
2279  /*--- Transform system in Upper Matrix ---*/
2280 
2281  for (iVar = 1; iVar < (short)nVar; iVar++) {
2282  for (jVar = 0; jVar < iVar; jVar++) {
2283  weight = A[iVar][jVar]/A[jVar][jVar];
2284  for (kVar = jVar; kVar < (short)nVar; kVar++)
2285  A[iVar][kVar] -= weight*A[jVar][kVar];
2286  rhs[iVar] -= weight*rhs[jVar];
2287  }
2288  }
2289 
2290  /*--- Backwards substitution ---*/
2291 
2292  rhs[nVar-1] = rhs[nVar-1]/A[nVar-1][nVar-1];
2293  for (iVar = (short)nVar-2; iVar >= 0; iVar--) {
2294  aux = 0;
2295  for (jVar = iVar+1; jVar < (short)nVar; jVar++)
2296  aux += A[iVar][jVar]*rhs[jVar];
2297  rhs[iVar] = (rhs[iVar]-aux)/A[iVar][iVar];
2298  if (iVar == 0) break;
2299  }
2300  }
2301 
2302 }
2303 
2304 void CSolver::Aeroelastic(CSurfaceMovement *surface_movement, CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, unsigned long TimeIter) {
2305 
2306  /*--- Variables used for Aeroelastic case ---*/
2307 
2308  su2double Cl, Cd, Cn, Ct, Cm, Cn_rot;
2309  su2double Alpha = config->GetAoA()*PI_NUMBER/180.0;
2310  vector<su2double> structural_solution(4,0.0); //contains solution(displacements and rates) of typical section wing model.
2311 
2312  unsigned short iMarker, iMarker_Monitoring, Monitoring;
2313  string Marker_Tag, Monitoring_Tag;
2314 
2315  /*--- Loop over markers and find the ones being monitored. ---*/
2316 
2317  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
2318  Monitoring = config->GetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker);
2319  if (Monitoring == YES) {
2320 
2321  /*--- Find the particular marker being monitored and get the forces acting on it. ---*/
2322 
2323  for (iMarker_Monitoring = 0; iMarker_Monitoring < config->GetnMarker_Monitoring(); iMarker_Monitoring++) {
2324  Monitoring_Tag = config->GetMarker_Monitoring_TagBound(iMarker_Monitoring);
2325  Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
2326  if (Marker_Tag == Monitoring_Tag) {
2327 
2328  Cl = GetSurface_CL(iMarker_Monitoring);
2329  Cd = GetSurface_CD(iMarker_Monitoring);
2330 
2331  /*--- For typical section wing model want the force normal to the airfoil (in the direction of the spring) ---*/
2332  Cn = Cl*cos(Alpha) + Cd*sin(Alpha);
2333  Ct = -Cl*sin(Alpha) + Cd*cos(Alpha);
2334 
2335  Cm = GetSurface_CMz(iMarker_Monitoring);
2336 
2337  /*--- Calculate forces for the Typical Section Wing Model taking into account rotation ---*/
2338 
2339  /*--- Note that the calculation of the forces and the subsequent displacements ...
2340  is only correct for the airfoil that starts at the 0 degree position ---*/
2341 
2342  if (config->GetKind_GridMovement() == AEROELASTIC_RIGID_MOTION) {
2343  su2double Omega, dt, psi;
2344  dt = config->GetDelta_UnstTimeND();
2345  Omega = (config->GetRotation_Rate(2)/config->GetOmega_Ref());
2346  psi = Omega*(dt*TimeIter);
2347 
2348  /*--- Correct for the airfoil starting position (This is hardcoded in here) ---*/
2349  if (Monitoring_Tag == "Airfoil1") {
2350  psi = psi + 0.0;
2351  }
2352  else if (Monitoring_Tag == "Airfoil2") {
2353  psi = psi + 2.0/3.0*PI_NUMBER;
2354  }
2355  else if (Monitoring_Tag == "Airfoil3") {
2356  psi = psi + 4.0/3.0*PI_NUMBER;
2357  }
2358  else
2359  cout << "WARNING: There is a marker that we are monitoring that doesn't match the values hardcoded above!" << endl;
2360 
2361  cout << Monitoring_Tag << " position " << psi*180.0/PI_NUMBER << " degrees. " << endl;
2362 
2363  Cn_rot = Cn*cos(psi) - Ct*sin(psi); //Note the signs are different for accounting for the AOA.
2364  Cn = Cn_rot;
2365  }
2366 
2367  /*--- Solve the aeroelastic equations for the particular marker(surface) ---*/
2368 
2369  SolveTypicalSectionWingModel(geometry, Cn, Cm, config, iMarker_Monitoring, structural_solution);
2370 
2371  break;
2372  }
2373  }
2374 
2375  /*--- Compute the new surface node locations ---*/
2376  surface_movement->AeroelasticDeform(geometry, config, TimeIter, iMarker, iMarker_Monitoring, structural_solution);
2377 
2378  }
2379 
2380  }
2381 
2382 }
2383 
2384 void CSolver::SetUpTypicalSectionWingModel(vector<vector<su2double> >& Phi, vector<su2double>& omega, CConfig *config) {
2385 
2386  /*--- Retrieve values from the config file ---*/
2387  su2double w_h = config->GetAeroelastic_Frequency_Plunge();
2388  su2double w_a = config->GetAeroelastic_Frequency_Pitch();
2389  su2double x_a = config->GetAeroelastic_CG_Location();
2390  su2double r_a = sqrt(config->GetAeroelastic_Radius_Gyration_Squared());
2391  su2double w = w_h/w_a;
2392 
2393  // Mass Matrix
2394  vector<vector<su2double> > M(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2395  M[0][0] = 1;
2396  M[0][1] = x_a;
2397  M[1][0] = x_a;
2398  M[1][1] = r_a*r_a;
2399 
2400  // Stiffness Matrix
2401  // vector<vector<su2double> > K(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2402  // K[0][0] = (w_h/w_a)*(w_h/w_a);
2403  // K[0][1] = 0.0;
2404  // K[1][0] = 0.0;
2405  // K[1][1] = r_a*r_a;
2406 
2407  /* Eigenvector and Eigenvalue Matrices of the Generalized EigenValue Problem. */
2408 
2409  vector<vector<su2double> > Omega2(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2410  su2double aux; // auxiliary variable
2411  aux = sqrt(pow(r_a,2)*pow(w,4) - 2*pow(r_a,2)*pow(w,2) + pow(r_a,2) + 4*pow(x_a,2)*pow(w,2));
2412  Phi[0][0] = (r_a * (r_a - r_a*pow(w,2) + aux)) / (2*x_a*pow(w, 2));
2413  Phi[0][1] = (r_a * (r_a - r_a*pow(w,2) - aux)) / (2*x_a*pow(w, 2));
2414  Phi[1][0] = 1.0;
2415  Phi[1][1] = 1.0;
2416 
2417  Omega2[0][0] = (r_a * (r_a + r_a*pow(w,2) - aux)) / (2*(pow(r_a, 2) - pow(x_a, 2)));
2418  Omega2[0][1] = 0;
2419  Omega2[1][0] = 0;
2420  Omega2[1][1] = (r_a * (r_a + r_a*pow(w,2) + aux)) / (2*(pow(r_a, 2) - pow(x_a, 2)));
2421 
2422  /* Nondimesionalize the Eigenvectors such that Phi'*M*Phi = I and PHI'*K*PHI = Omega */
2423  // Phi'*M*Phi = D
2424  // D^(-1/2)*Phi'*M*Phi*D^(-1/2) = D^(-1/2)*D^(1/2)*D^(1/2)*D^(-1/2) = I, D^(-1/2) = inv(sqrt(D))
2425  // Phi = Phi*D^(-1/2)
2426 
2427  vector<vector<su2double> > Aux(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2428  vector<vector<su2double> > D(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2429  // Aux = M*Phi
2430  for (int i=0; i<2; i++) {
2431  for (int j=0; j<2; j++) {
2432  Aux[i][j] = 0;
2433  for (int k=0; k<2; k++) {
2434  Aux[i][j] += M[i][k]*Phi[k][j];
2435  }
2436  }
2437  }
2438 
2439  // D = Phi'*Aux
2440  for (int i=0; i<2; i++) {
2441  for (int j=0; j<2; j++) {
2442  D[i][j] = 0;
2443  for (int k=0; k<2; k++) {
2444  D[i][j] += Phi[k][i]*Aux[k][j]; //PHI transpose
2445  }
2446  }
2447  }
2448 
2449  //Modify the first column
2450  Phi[0][0] = Phi[0][0] * 1/sqrt(D[0][0]);
2451  Phi[1][0] = Phi[1][0] * 1/sqrt(D[0][0]);
2452  //Modify the second column
2453  Phi[0][1] = Phi[0][1] * 1/sqrt(D[1][1]);
2454  Phi[1][1] = Phi[1][1] * 1/sqrt(D[1][1]);
2455 
2456  // Sqrt of the eigenvalues (frequency of vibration of the modes)
2457  omega[0] = sqrt(Omega2[0][0]);
2458  omega[1] = sqrt(Omega2[1][1]);
2459 
2460 }
2461 
2462 void CSolver::SolveTypicalSectionWingModel(CGeometry *geometry, su2double Cl, su2double Cm, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMarker, vector<su2double>& displacements) {
2463 
2464  /*--- The aeroelastic model solved in this routine is the typical section wing model
2465  The details of the implementation are similar to those found in J.J. Alonso
2466  "Fully-Implicit Time-Marching Aeroelastic Solutions" 1994. ---*/
2467 
2468  /*--- Retrieve values from the config file ---*/
2469  su2double w_alpha = config->GetAeroelastic_Frequency_Pitch();
2470  su2double vf = config->GetAeroelastic_Flutter_Speed_Index();
2471  su2double b = config->GetLength_Reynolds()/2.0; // airfoil semichord, Reynolds length is by defaul 1.0
2472  su2double dt = config->GetDelta_UnstTimeND();
2473  dt = dt*w_alpha; //Non-dimensionalize the structural time.
2474 
2475  /*--- Structural Equation damping ---*/
2476  vector<su2double> xi(2,0.0);
2477 
2478  /*--- Eigenvectors and Eigenvalues of the Generalized EigenValue Problem. ---*/
2479  vector<vector<su2double> > Phi(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0)); // generalized eigenvectors.
2480  vector<su2double> w(2,0.0); // sqrt of the generalized eigenvalues (frequency of vibration of the modes).
2481  SetUpTypicalSectionWingModel(Phi, w, config);
2482 
2483  /*--- Solving the Decoupled Aeroelastic Problem with second order time discretization Eq (9) ---*/
2484 
2485  /*--- Solution variables description. //x[j][i], j-entry, i-equation. // Time (n+1)->np1, n->n, (n-1)->n1 ---*/
2486  vector<vector<su2double> > x_np1(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2487 
2488  /*--- Values from previous movement of spring at true time step n+1
2489  We use this values because we are solving for delta changes not absolute changes ---*/
2490  vector<vector<su2double> > x_np1_old = config->GetAeroelastic_np1(iMarker);
2491 
2492  /*--- Values at previous timesteps. ---*/
2493  vector<vector<su2double> > x_n = config->GetAeroelastic_n(iMarker);
2494  vector<vector<su2double> > x_n1 = config->GetAeroelastic_n1(iMarker);
2495 
2496  /*--- Set up of variables used to solve the structural problem. ---*/
2497  vector<su2double> f_tilde(2,0.0);
2498  vector<vector<su2double> > A_inv(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2499  su2double detA;
2500  su2double s1, s2;
2501  vector<su2double> rhs(2,0.0); //right hand side
2502  vector<su2double> eta(2,0.0);
2503  vector<su2double> eta_dot(2,0.0);
2504 
2505  /*--- Forcing Term ---*/
2506  su2double cons = vf*vf/PI_NUMBER;
2507  vector<su2double> f(2,0.0);
2508  f[0] = cons*(-Cl);
2509  f[1] = cons*(2*-Cm);
2510 
2511  //f_tilde = Phi'*f
2512  for (int i=0; i<2; i++) {
2513  f_tilde[i] = 0;
2514  for (int k=0; k<2; k++) {
2515  f_tilde[i] += Phi[k][i]*f[k]; //PHI transpose
2516  }
2517  }
2518 
2519  /*--- solve each decoupled equation (The inverse of the 2x2 matrix is provided) ---*/
2520  for (int i=0; i<2; i++) {
2521  /* Matrix Inverse */
2522  detA = 9.0/(4.0*dt*dt) + 3*w[i]*xi[i]/(dt) + w[i]*w[i];
2523  A_inv[0][0] = 1/detA * (3/(2.0*dt) + 2*xi[i]*w[i]);
2524  A_inv[0][1] = 1/detA * 1;
2525  A_inv[1][0] = 1/detA * -w[i]*w[i];
2526  A_inv[1][1] = 1/detA * 3/(2.0*dt);
2527 
2528  /* Source Terms from previous iterations */
2529  s1 = (-4*x_n[0][i] + x_n1[0][i])/(2.0*dt);
2530  s2 = (-4*x_n[1][i] + x_n1[1][i])/(2.0*dt);
2531 
2532  /* Problem Right Hand Side */
2533  rhs[0] = -s1;
2534  rhs[1] = f_tilde[i]-s2;
2535 
2536  /* Solve the equations */
2537  x_np1[0][i] = A_inv[0][0]*rhs[0] + A_inv[0][1]*rhs[1];
2538  x_np1[1][i] = A_inv[1][0]*rhs[0] + A_inv[1][1]*rhs[1];
2539 
2540  eta[i] = x_np1[0][i]-x_np1_old[0][i]; // For displacements, the change(deltas) is used.
2541  eta_dot[i] = x_np1[1][i]; // For velocities, absolute values are used.
2542  }
2543 
2544  /*--- Transform back from the generalized coordinates to get the actual displacements in plunge and pitch q = Phi*eta ---*/
2545  vector<su2double> q(2,0.0);
2546  vector<su2double> q_dot(2,0.0);
2547  for (int i=0; i<2; i++) {
2548  q[i] = 0;
2549  q_dot[i] = 0;
2550  for (int k=0; k<2; k++) {
2551  q[i] += Phi[i][k]*eta[k];
2552  q_dot[i] += Phi[i][k]*eta_dot[k];
2553  }
2554  }
2555 
2556  su2double dh = b*q[0];
2557  su2double dalpha = q[1];
2558 
2559  su2double h_dot = w_alpha*b*q_dot[0]; //The w_a brings it back to actual time.
2560  su2double alpha_dot = w_alpha*q_dot[1];
2561 
2562  /*--- Set the solution of the structural equations ---*/
2563  displacements[0] = dh;
2564  displacements[1] = dalpha;
2565  displacements[2] = h_dot;
2566  displacements[3] = alpha_dot;
2567 
2568  /*--- Calculate the total plunge and total pitch displacements for the unsteady step by summing the displacement at each sudo time step ---*/
2569  su2double pitch, plunge;
2570  pitch = config->GetAeroelastic_pitch(iMarker);
2571  plunge = config->GetAeroelastic_plunge(iMarker);
2572 
2573  config->SetAeroelastic_pitch(iMarker , pitch+dalpha);
2574  config->SetAeroelastic_plunge(iMarker , plunge+dh/b);
2575 
2576  /*--- Set the Aeroelastic solution at time n+1. This gets update every sudo time step
2577  and after convering the sudo time step the solution at n+1 get moved to the solution at n
2578  in SetDualTime_Solver method ---*/
2579 
2580  config->SetAeroelastic_np1(iMarker, x_np1);
2581 
2582 }
2583 
2584 void CSolver::Restart_OldGeometry(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) const {
2585 
2586  BEGIN_SU2_OMP_SAFE_GLOBAL_ACCESS {
2587 
2588  /*--- This function is intended for dual time simulations ---*/
2589 
2590  int Unst_RestartIter;
2591  ifstream restart_file_n;
2592 
2593  string filename = config->GetSolution_FileName();
2594  string filename_n;
2595 
2596  /*--- Auxiliary vector for storing the coordinates ---*/
2597  su2double Coord[3] = {0.0};
2598 
2599  /*--- Variables for reading the restart files ---*/
2600  string text_line;
2601  long iPoint_Local;
2602  unsigned long iPoint_Global_Local = 0, iPoint_Global = 0;
2603 
2604  /*--- First, we load the restart file for time n ---*/
2605 
2606  /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2607 
2608  /*--- Modify file name for an unsteady restart ---*/
2609  if (config->GetRestart()) Unst_RestartIter = SU2_TYPE::Int(config->GetRestart_Iter())-1;
2610  else Unst_RestartIter = SU2_TYPE::Int(config->GetUnst_AdjointIter())-1;
2611  filename_n = config->GetFilename(filename, ".csv", Unst_RestartIter);
2612 
2613  /*--- Open the restart file, throw an error if this fails. ---*/
2614 
2615  restart_file_n.open(filename_n.data(), ios::in);
2616  if (restart_file_n.fail()) {
2617  SU2_MPI::Error(string("There is no flow restart file ") + filename_n, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2618  }
2619 
2620  /*--- First, set all indices to a negative value by default, and Global n indices to 0 ---*/
2621  iPoint_Global_Local = 0; iPoint_Global = 0;
2622 
2623  /*--- Read all lines in the restart file ---*/
2624  /*--- The first line is the header ---*/
2625 
2626  getline (restart_file_n, text_line);
2627 
2628  for (iPoint_Global = 0; iPoint_Global < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); iPoint_Global++ ) {
2629 
2630  getline (restart_file_n, text_line);
2631 
2632  vector<string> point_line = PrintingToolbox::split(text_line, ',');
2633 
2634  /*--- Retrieve local index. If this node from the restart file lives
2635  on the current processor, we will load and instantiate the vars. ---*/
2636 
2637  iPoint_Local = geometry->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global);
2638 
2639  if (iPoint_Local > -1) {
2640 
2641  Coord[0] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[1]);
2642  Coord[1] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[2]);
2643  if (nDim == 3){
2644  Coord[2] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[3]);
2645  }
2646  geometry->nodes->SetCoord_n(iPoint_Local, Coord);
2647 
2648  iPoint_Global_Local++;
2649  }
2650  }
2651 
2652  /*--- Detect a wrong solution file ---*/
2653 
2654  if (iPoint_Global_Local < geometry->GetnPointDomain()) {
2655  SU2_MPI::Error(string("The solution file ") + filename + string(" doesn't match with the mesh file!\n") +
2656  string("It could be empty lines at the end of the file."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2657  }
2658 
2659  /*--- Close the restart file ---*/
2660 
2661  restart_file_n.close();
2662 
2663  /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2664  /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2665 
2666  /*--- Now, we load the restart file for time n-1, if the simulation is 2nd Order ---*/
2667 
2668  if (config->GetTime_Marching() == TIME_MARCHING::DT_STEPPING_2ND) {
2669 
2670  ifstream restart_file_n1;
2671  string filename_n1;
2672 
2673  /*--- Modify file name for an unsteady restart ---*/
2674  if (config->GetRestart()) Unst_RestartIter = SU2_TYPE::Int(config->GetRestart_Iter())-2;
2675  else Unst_RestartIter = SU2_TYPE::Int(config->GetUnst_AdjointIter())-2;
2676  filename_n1 = config->GetFilename(filename, ".csv", Unst_RestartIter);
2677 
2678  /*--- Open the restart file, throw an error if this fails. ---*/
2679 
2680  restart_file_n1.open(filename_n1.data(), ios::in);
2681  if (restart_file_n1.fail()) {
2682  SU2_MPI::Error(string("There is no flow restart file ") + filename_n1, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2683 
2684  }
2685 
2686  /*--- First, set all indices to a negative value by default, and Global n indices to 0 ---*/
2687  iPoint_Global_Local = 0; iPoint_Global = 0;
2688 
2689  /*--- Read all lines in the restart file ---*/
2690  /*--- The first line is the header ---*/
2691 
2692  getline (restart_file_n1, text_line);
2693 
2694  for (iPoint_Global = 0; iPoint_Global < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); iPoint_Global++ ) {
2695 
2696  getline (restart_file_n1, text_line);
2697 
2698  vector<string> point_line = PrintingToolbox::split(text_line, ',');
2699 
2700  /*--- Retrieve local index. If this node from the restart file lives
2701  on the current processor, we will load and instantiate the vars. ---*/
2702 
2703  iPoint_Local = geometry->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global);
2704 
2705  if (iPoint_Local > -1) {
2706 
2707  Coord[0] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[1]);
2708  Coord[1] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[2]);
2709  if (nDim == 3){
2710  Coord[2] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[3]);
2711  }
2712 
2713  geometry->nodes->SetCoord_n1(iPoint_Local, Coord);
2714 
2715  iPoint_Global_Local++;
2716  }
2717 
2718  }
2719 
2720  /*--- Detect a wrong solution file ---*/
2721 
2722  if (iPoint_Global_Local < geometry->GetnPointDomain()) {
2723  SU2_MPI::Error(string("The solution file ") + filename + string(" doesn't match with the mesh file!\n") +
2724  string("It could be empty lines at the end of the file."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2725  }
2726 
2727  /*--- Close the restart file ---*/
2728 
2729  restart_file_n1.close();
2730 
2731  }
2732 
2733  }
2734  END_SU2_OMP_SAFE_GLOBAL_ACCESS
2735 
2736  /*--- It's necessary to communicate this information ---*/
2737 
2738  geometry->InitiateComms(geometry, config, MPI_QUANTITIES::COORDINATES_OLD);
2739  geometry->CompleteComms(geometry, config, MPI_QUANTITIES::COORDINATES_OLD);
2740 
2741 }

2743 void CSolver::Read_SU2_Restart_ASCII(CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config, string val_filename) {
2744 
2745  ifstream restart_file;
2746  string text_line, Tag;
2747  unsigned short iVar;
2748  long iPoint_Local = 0; unsigned long iPoint_Global = 0;
2749  int counter = 0;
2750  fields.clear();
2751 
2752  Restart_Vars.resize(5);
2753 
2754  string error_string = "Note: ASCII restart files must be in CSV format since v7.0.\n"
2755  "Check https://su2code.github.io/docs/Guide-to-v7 for more information.";
2756 
2757  /*--- First, check that this is not a binary restart file. ---*/
2758 
2759  char fname[100];
2760  val_filename += ".csv";
2761  strcpy(fname, val_filename.c_str());
2762  int magic_number;
2763 
2764 #ifndef HAVE_MPI
2765 
2766  /*--- Serial binary input. ---*/
2767 
2768  FILE *fhw;
2769  fhw = fopen(fname,"rb");
2770  size_t ret;
2771 
2772  /*--- Error check for opening the file. ---*/
2773 
2774  if (!fhw) {
2775  SU2_MPI::Error(string("Unable to open SU2 restart file ") + fname, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2776  }
2777 
2778  /*--- Attempt to read the first int, which should be our magic number. ---*/
2779 
2780  ret = fread(&magic_number, sizeof(int), 1, fhw);
2781  if (ret != 1) {
2782  SU2_MPI::Error("Error reading restart file.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2783  }
2784 
2785  /*--- Check that this is an SU2 binary file. SU2 binary files
2786  have the hex representation of "SU2" as the first int in the file. ---*/
2787 
2788  if (magic_number == 535532) {
2789  SU2_MPI::Error(string("File ") + string(fname) + string(" is a binary SU2 restart file, expected ASCII.\n") +
2790  string("SU2 reads/writes binary restart files by default.\n") +
2791  string("Note that backward compatibility for ASCII restart files is\n") +
2792  string("possible with the READ_BINARY_RESTART option."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2793  }
2794 
2795  fclose(fhw);
2796 
2797 #else
2798 
2799  /*--- Parallel binary input using MPI I/O. ---*/
2800 
2801  MPI_File fhw;
2802  int ierr;
2803 
2804  /*--- All ranks open the file using MPI. ---*/
2805 
2806  ierr = MPI_File_open(SU2_MPI::GetComm(), fname, MPI_MODE_RDONLY, MPI_INFO_NULL, &fhw);
2807 
2808  /*--- Error check opening the file. ---*/
2809 
2810  if (ierr) {
2811  SU2_MPI::Error(string("SU2 ASCII restart file ") + string(fname) + string(" not found.\n") + error_string,
2812  CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2813  }
2814 
2815  /*--- Have the master attempt to read the magic number. ---*/
2816 
2817  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
2818  MPI_File_read(fhw, &magic_number, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
2819 
2820  /*--- Broadcast the number of variables to all procs and store clearly. ---*/
2821 
2822  SU2_MPI::Bcast(&magic_number, 1, MPI_INT, MASTER_NODE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
2823 
2824  /*--- Check that this is an SU2 binary file. SU2 binary files
2825  have the hex representation of "SU2" as the first int in the file. ---*/
2826 
2827  if (magic_number == 535532) {
2828  SU2_MPI::Error(string("File ") + string(fname) + string(" is a binary SU2 restart file, expected ASCII.\n") +
2829  string("SU2 reads/writes binary restart files by default.\n") +
2830  string("Note that backward compatibility for ASCII restart files is\n") +
2831  string("possible with the READ_BINARY_RESTART option."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2832  }
2833 
2834  MPI_File_close(&fhw);
2835 
2836 #endif
2837 
2838  /*--- Open the restart file ---*/
2839 
2840  restart_file.open(val_filename.data(), ios::in);
2841 
2842  /*--- In case there is no restart file ---*/
2843 
2844  if (restart_file.fail()) {
2845  SU2_MPI::Error(string("SU2 ASCII restart file ") + string(fname) + string(" not found.\n") + error_string,
2846  CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2847  }
2848 
2849  /*--- Identify the number of fields (and names) in the restart file ---*/
2850 
2851  getline (restart_file, text_line);
2852 
2853  char delimiter = ',';
2854  fields = PrintingToolbox::split(text_line, delimiter);
2855 
2856  if (fields.size() <= 1) {
2857  SU2_MPI::Error(string("Restart file does not seem to be a CSV file.\n") + error_string, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2858  }
2859 
2860  for (unsigned short iField = 0; iField < fields.size(); iField++){
2861  PrintingToolbox::trim(fields[iField]);
2862  }
2863 
2864  /*--- Set the number of variables, one per field in the
2865  restart file (without including the PointID) ---*/
2866 
2867  Restart_Vars[1] = (int)fields.size() - 1;
2868 
2869  /*--- Allocate memory for the restart data. ---*/
2870 
2871  Restart_Data.resize(Restart_Vars[1]*geometry->GetnPointDomain());
2872 
2873  /*--- Read all lines in the restart file and extract data. ---*/
2874 
2875  for (iPoint_Global = 0; iPoint_Global < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); iPoint_Global++) {
2876 
2877  if (!getline (restart_file, text_line)) break;
2878 
2879  /*--- Retrieve local index. If this node from the restart file lives
2880  on the current processor, we will load and instantiate the vars. ---*/
2881 
2882  iPoint_Local = geometry->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global);
2883 
2884  if (iPoint_Local > -1) {
2885 
2886  vector<string> point_line = PrintingToolbox::split(text_line, delimiter);
2887 
2888  /*--- Store the solution (starting with node coordinates) --*/
2889 
2890  for (iVar = 0; iVar < Restart_Vars[1]; iVar++)
2891  Restart_Data[counter*Restart_Vars[1] + iVar] = SU2_TYPE::GetValue(PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[iVar+1]));
2892 
2893  /*--- Increment our local point counter. ---*/
2894 
2895  counter++;
2896 
2897  }
2898  }
2899 
2900  if (iPoint_Global != geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain())
2901  SU2_MPI::Error("The solution file does not match the mesh, currently only binary files can be interpolated.",
2902  CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2903 
2904 }

2906 void CSolver::Read_SU2_Restart_Binary(CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config, string val_filename) {
2907 
2908  char str_buf[CGNS_STRING_SIZE], fname[100];
2909  val_filename += ".dat";
2910  strcpy(fname, val_filename.c_str());
2911  const int nRestart_Vars = 5;
2912  Restart_Vars.resize(nRestart_Vars);
2913  fields.clear();
2914 
2915 #ifndef HAVE_MPI
2916 
2917  /*--- Serial binary input. ---*/
2918 
2919  FILE *fhw;
2920  fhw = fopen(fname,"rb");
2921  size_t ret;
2922 
2923  /*--- Error check for opening the file. ---*/
2924 
2925  if (!fhw) {
2926  SU2_MPI::Error(string("Unable to open SU2 restart file ") + string(fname), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2927  }
2928 
2929  /*--- First, read the number of variables and points. ---*/
2930 
2931  ret = fread(Restart_Vars.data(), sizeof(int), nRestart_Vars, fhw);
2932  if (ret != (unsigned long)nRestart_Vars) {
2933  SU2_MPI::Error("Error reading restart file.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2934  }
2935 
2936  /*--- Check that this is an SU2 binary file. SU2 binary files
2937  have the hex representation of "SU2" as the first int in the file. ---*/
2938 
2939  if (Restart_Vars[0] != 535532) {
2940  SU2_MPI::Error(string("File ") + string(fname) + string(" is not a binary SU2 restart file.\n") +
2941  string("SU2 reads/writes binary restart files by default.\n") +
2942  string("Note that backward compatibility for ASCII restart files is\n") +
2943  string("possible with the READ_BINARY_RESTART option."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2944  }
2945 
2946  /*--- Store the number of fields and points to be read for clarity. ---*/
2947 
2948  const unsigned long nFields = Restart_Vars[1];
2949  const unsigned long nPointFile = Restart_Vars[2];
2950 
2951  /*--- Read the variable names from the file. Note that we are adopting a
2952  fixed length of 33 for the string length to match with CGNS. This is
2953  needed for when we read the strings later. We pad the beginning of the
2954  variable string vector with the Point_ID tag that wasn't written. ---*/
2955 
2956  fields.push_back("Point_ID");
2957  for (auto iVar = 0u; iVar < nFields; iVar++) {
2958  ret = fread(str_buf, sizeof(char), CGNS_STRING_SIZE, fhw);
2959  if (ret != (unsigned long)CGNS_STRING_SIZE) {
2960  SU2_MPI::Error("Error reading restart file.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2961  }
2962  fields.push_back(str_buf);
2963  }
2964 
2965  /*--- For now, create a temp 1D buffer to read the data from file. ---*/
2966 
2967  Restart_Data.resize(nFields*nPointFile);
2968 
2969  /*--- Read in the data for the restart at all local points. ---*/
2970 
2971  ret = fread(Restart_Data.data(), sizeof(passivedouble), nFields*nPointFile, fhw);
2972  if (ret != nFields*nPointFile) {
2973  SU2_MPI::Error("Error reading restart file.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2974  }
2975 
2976  /*--- Close the file. ---*/
2977 
2978  fclose(fhw);
2979 
2980 #else
2981 
2982  /*--- Parallel binary input using MPI I/O. ---*/
2983 
2984  MPI_File fhw;
2985  SU2_MPI::Status status;
2986  MPI_Datatype etype, filetype;
2987  MPI_Offset disp;
2988 
2989  /*--- All ranks open the file using MPI. ---*/
2990 
2991  int ierr = MPI_File_open(SU2_MPI::GetComm(), fname, MPI_MODE_RDONLY, MPI_INFO_NULL, &fhw);
2992 
2993  if (ierr) SU2_MPI::Error(string("Unable to open SU2 restart file ") + string(fname), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2994 
2995  /*--- First, read the number of variables and points (i.e., cols and rows),
2996  which we will need in order to read the file later. Also, read the
2997  variable string names here. Only the master rank reads the header. ---*/
2998 
2999  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
3000  MPI_File_read(fhw, Restart_Vars.data(), nRestart_Vars, MPI_INT, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
3001 
3002  /*--- Broadcast the number of variables to all procs and store clearly. ---*/
3003 
3004  SU2_MPI::Bcast(Restart_Vars.data(), nRestart_Vars, MPI_INT, MASTER_NODE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
3005 
3006  /*--- Check that this is an SU2 binary file. SU2 binary files
3007  have the hex representation of "SU2" as the first int in the file. ---*/
3008 
3009  if (Restart_Vars[0] != 535532) {
3010  SU2_MPI::Error(string("File ") + string(fname) + string(" is not a binary SU2 restart file.\n") +
3011  string("SU2 reads/writes binary restart files by default.\n") +
3012  string("Note that backward compatibility for ASCII restart files is\n") +
3013  string("possible with the READ_BINARY_RESTART option."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3014  }
3015 
3016  /*--- Store the number of fields and points to be read for clarity. ---*/
3017 
3018  const unsigned long nFields = Restart_Vars[1];
3019  const unsigned long nPointFile = Restart_Vars[2];
3020 
3021  /*--- Read the variable names from the file. Note that we are adopting a
3022  fixed length of 33 for the string length to match with CGNS. This is
3023  needed for when we read the strings later. ---*/
3024 
3025  char *mpi_str_buf = new char[nFields*CGNS_STRING_SIZE];
3026  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3027  disp = nRestart_Vars*sizeof(int);
3028  MPI_File_read_at(fhw, disp, mpi_str_buf, nFields*CGNS_STRING_SIZE,
3029  MPI_CHAR, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
3030  }
3031 
3032  /*--- Broadcast the string names of the variables. ---*/
3033 
3034  SU2_MPI::Bcast(mpi_str_buf, nFields*CGNS_STRING_SIZE, MPI_CHAR,
3035  MASTER_NODE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
3036 
3037  /*--- Now parse the string names and load into the config class in case
3038  we need them for writing visualization files (SU2_SOL). ---*/
3039 
3040  fields.emplace_back("Point_ID");
3041  for (auto iVar = 0u; iVar < nFields; iVar++) {
3042  const auto index = iVar*CGNS_STRING_SIZE;
3043  string field_buf("\"");
3044  for (int iChar = 0; iChar < CGNS_STRING_SIZE; iChar++) {
3045  str_buf[iChar] = mpi_str_buf[index + iChar];
3046  }
3047  field_buf.append(str_buf);
3048  field_buf.append("\"");
3049  fields.emplace_back(field_buf.c_str());
3050  }
3051 
3052  /*--- Free string buffer memory. ---*/
3053 
3054  delete [] mpi_str_buf;
3055 
3056  /*--- We're writing only su2doubles in the data portion of the file. ---*/
3057 
3058  etype = MPI_DOUBLE;
3059 
3060  /*--- We need to ignore the 4 ints describing the nVar_Restart and nPoints,
3061  along with the string names of the variables. ---*/
3062 
3063  disp = nRestart_Vars*sizeof(int) + CGNS_STRING_SIZE*nFields*sizeof(char);
3064 
3065  /*--- Define a derived datatype for this rank's set of non-contiguous data
3066  that will be placed in the restart. Here, we are collecting each one of the
3067  points which are distributed throughout the file in blocks of nVar_Restart data. ---*/
3068 
3069  int nBlock;
3070  int *blocklen = nullptr;
3071  MPI_Aint *displace = nullptr;
3072 
3073  if (nPointFile == geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain() ||
3074  config->GetKind_SU2() == SU2_COMPONENT::SU2_SOL) {
3075  /*--- No interpolation, each rank reads the indices it needs. ---*/
3076  nBlock = geometry->GetnPointDomain();
3077 
3078  blocklen = new int[nBlock];
3079  displace = new MPI_Aint[nBlock];
3080  int counter = 0;
3081  for (auto iPoint_Global = 0ul; iPoint_Global < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); ++iPoint_Global) {
3082  if (geometry->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global) > -1) {
3083  blocklen[counter] = nFields;
3084  displace[counter] = iPoint_Global*nFields*sizeof(passivedouble);
3085  counter++;
3086  }
3087  }
3088  }
3089  else {
3090  /*--- Interpolation required, read large blocks of data. ---*/
3091  nBlock = 1;
3092 
3093  blocklen = new int[nBlock];
3094  displace = new MPI_Aint[nBlock];
3095 
3096  const auto partitioner = CLinearPartitioner(nPointFile,0);
3097 
3098  blocklen[0] = nFields*partitioner.GetSizeOnRank(rank);
3099  displace[0] = nFields*partitioner.GetFirstIndexOnRank(rank)*sizeof(passivedouble);;
3100  }
3101 
3102  MPI_Type_create_hindexed(nBlock, blocklen, displace, MPI_DOUBLE, &filetype);
3103  MPI_Type_commit(&filetype);
3104 
3105  /*--- Set the view for the MPI file write, i.e., describe the location in
3106  the file that this rank "sees" for writing its piece of the restart file. ---*/
3107 
3108  MPI_File_set_view(fhw, disp, etype, filetype, (char*)"native", MPI_INFO_NULL);
3109 
3110  /*--- For now, create a temp 1D buffer to read the data from file. ---*/
3111 
3112  const int bufSize = nBlock*blocklen[0];
3113  Restart_Data.resize(bufSize);
3114 
3115  /*--- Collective call for all ranks to read from their view simultaneously. ---*/
3116 
3117  MPI_File_read_all(fhw, Restart_Data.data(), bufSize, MPI_DOUBLE, &status);
3118 
3119  /*--- All ranks close the file after writing. ---*/
3120 
3121  MPI_File_close(&fhw);
3122 
3123  /*--- Free the derived datatype and release temp memory. ---*/
3124 
3125  MPI_Type_free(&filetype);
3126 
3127  delete [] blocklen;
3128  delete [] displace;
3129 
3130 #endif
3131 
3132  if (nPointFile != geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain() &&
3133  config->GetKind_SU2() != SU2_COMPONENT::SU2_SOL) {
3134  InterpolateRestartData(geometry, config);
3135  }
3136 }
3137 
3138 void CSolver::InterpolateRestartData(const CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config) {
3139 
3140  if (geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain() == 0) return;
3141 
3142  if (size != SINGLE_NODE && size % 2)
3143  SU2_MPI::Error("Number of ranks must be multiple of 2.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3144 
3145  if (config->GetFEMSolver())
3146  SU2_MPI::Error("Cannot interpolate the restart file for FEM problems.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3147 
3148  /* Challenges:
3149  * - Do not use too much memory by gathering the restart data in all ranks.
3150  * - Do not repeat too many computations in all ranks.
3151  * Solution?:
3152  * - Build a local ADT for the domain points (not the restart points).
3153  * - Find the closest target point for each donor, which does not match all targets.
3154  * - "Diffuse" the data to neighbor points.
3155  * Complexity is approx. Nlt + (Nlt + Nd) log(Nlt) where Nlt is the LOCAL number
3156  * of target points and Nd the TOTAL number of donors. */
3157 
3158  const unsigned long nFields = Restart_Vars[1];
3159  const unsigned long nPointFile = Restart_Vars[2];
3160  const auto t0 = SU2_MPI::Wtime();
3161  auto nRecurse = 0;
3162 
3163  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3164  cout << "\nThe number of points in the restart file (" << nPointFile << ") does not match "
3165  "the mesh (" << geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain() << ").\n"
3166  "A recursive nearest neighbor interpolation will be performed." << endl;
3167  }
3168 
3169  su2activematrix localVars(nPointDomain, nFields);
3170  localVars = su2double(0.0);
3171  {
3172  su2vector<uint8_t> isMapped(nPoint);
3173  isMapped = false;
3174 
3175  /*--- ADT of local target points. ---*/
3176  {
3177  const auto& coord = geometry->nodes->GetCoord();
3178  vector<unsigned long> index(nPointDomain);
3179  iota(index.begin(), index.end(), 0ul);
3180 
3181  CADTPointsOnlyClass adt(nDim, nPointDomain, coord.data(), index.data(), false);
3182  vector<unsigned long>().swap(index);
3183 
3184  /*--- Copy local donor restart data, which will circulate over all ranks. ---*/
3185 
3186  const auto partitioner = CLinearPartitioner(nPointFile,0);
3187 
3188  unsigned long nPointDonorMax = 0;
3189  for (int i=0; i<size; ++i)
3190  nPointDonorMax = max(nPointDonorMax, partitioner.GetSizeOnRank(i));
3191 
3192  su2activematrix sendBuf(nPointDonorMax, nFields);
3193 
3194  for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPointDonorMax; ++iPoint) {
3195  const auto iPointDonor = min(iPoint,partitioner.GetSizeOnRank(rank)-1ul);
3196  for (auto iVar = 0ul; iVar < nFields; ++iVar)
3197  sendBuf(iPoint,iVar) = Restart_Data[iPointDonor*nFields+iVar];
3198  }
3199 
3200  Restart_Data = decltype(Restart_Data){};
3201 
3202  /*--- Make room to receive donor data from other ranks, and to map it to target points. ---*/
3203 
3204  su2activematrix donorVars(nPointDonorMax, nFields);
3205  vector<su2double> donorDist(nPointDomain, 1e12);
3206 
3207  /*--- Circle over all ranks. ---*/
3208 
3209  const int dst = (rank+1) % size; // send to next
3210  const int src = (rank-1+size) % size; // receive from prev.
3211  const int count = sendBuf.size();
3212 
3213  for (int iStep = 0; iStep < size; ++iStep) {
3214 
3215  swap(sendBuf, donorVars);
3216 
3217  if (iStep) {
3218  /*--- Odd ranks send and then receive, and vice versa. ---*/
3219  if (rank%2) SU2_MPI::Send(sendBuf.data(), count, MPI_DOUBLE, dst, 0, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
3220  else SU2_MPI::Recv(donorVars.data(), count, MPI_DOUBLE, src, 0, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
3221 
3222  if (rank%2==0) SU2_MPI::Send(sendBuf.data(), count, MPI_DOUBLE, dst, 0, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
3223  else SU2_MPI::Recv(donorVars.data(), count, MPI_DOUBLE, src, 0, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
3224  }
3225 
3226  /*--- Find the closest target for each donor. ---*/
3227 
3228  vector<su2double> targetDist(donorVars.rows());
3229  vector<unsigned long> iTarget(donorVars.rows());
3230 
3231  SU2_OMP_PARALLEL_(for schedule(dynamic,4*OMP_MIN_SIZE))
3232  for (auto iDonor = 0ul; iDonor < donorVars.rows(); ++iDonor) {
3233  int r=0;
3234  adt.DetermineNearestNode(donorVars[iDonor], targetDist[iDonor], iTarget[iDonor], r);
3235  }
3236  END_SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
3237 
3238  /*--- Keep the closest donor for each target (this is separate for OpenMP). ---*/
3239 
3240  for (auto iDonor = 0ul; iDonor < donorVars.rows(); ++iDonor) {
3241  const auto iPoint = iTarget[iDonor];
3242  const auto dist = targetDist[iDonor];
3243 
3244  if (dist < donorDist[iPoint]) {
3245  donorDist[iPoint] = dist;
3246  isMapped[iPoint] = true;
3247  for (auto iVar = 0ul; iVar < donorVars.cols(); ++iVar)
3248  localVars(iPoint,iVar) = donorVars(iDonor,iVar);
3249  }
3250  }
3251  }
3252  } // everything goes out of scope except "localVars" and "isMapped"
3253 
3254  /*--- Recursively diffuse the nearest neighbor data. ---*/
3255 
3256  auto nDonor = isMapped;
3257  bool done = false;
3258 
3259  SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
3260  while (!done) {
3261  SU2_OMP_FOR_DYN(roundUpDiv(nPointDomain,2*omp_get_num_threads()))
3262  for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPointDomain; ++iPoint) {
3263  /*--- Do not change points that are already interpolated. ---*/
3264  if (isMapped[iPoint]) continue;
3265 
3266  /*--- Boundaries to boundaries and domain to domain. ---*/
3267  const bool boundary_i = geometry->nodes->GetSolidBoundary(iPoint);
3268 
3269  for (const auto jPoint : geometry->nodes->GetPoints(iPoint)) {
3270  if (!isMapped[jPoint]) continue;
3271  if (boundary_i != geometry->nodes->GetSolidBoundary(jPoint)) continue;
3272 
3273  nDonor[iPoint]++;
3274 
3275  for (auto iVar = 0ul; iVar < localVars.cols(); ++iVar)
3276  localVars(iPoint,iVar) += localVars(jPoint,iVar);
3277  }
3278 
3279  if (nDonor[iPoint] > 0) {
3280  for (auto iVar = 0ul; iVar < localVars.cols(); ++iVar)
3281  localVars(iPoint,iVar) /= nDonor[iPoint];
3282  nDonor[iPoint] = true;
3283  }
3284  }
3285  END_SU2_OMP_FOR
3286 
3287  /*--- Repeat while all points are not mapped. ---*/
3288 
3289  SU2_OMP_MASTER {
3290  done = true;
3291  ++nRecurse;
3292  }
3293  END_SU2_OMP_MASTER
3294 
3295  bool myDone = true;
3296 
3297  SU2_OMP_FOR_STAT(16*OMP_MIN_SIZE)
3298  for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPointDomain; ++iPoint) {
3299  isMapped[iPoint] = nDonor[iPoint];
3300  myDone &= nDonor[iPoint];
3301  }
3302  END_SU2_OMP_FOR
3303 
3304  SU2_OMP_ATOMIC
3305  done &= myDone;
3306 
3307  SU2_OMP_BARRIER
3308  }
3309  END_SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
3310 
3311  } // everything goes out of scope except "localVars"
3312 
3313  /*--- Move to Restart_Data in ascending order of global index, which is how a matching restart would have been read. ---*/
3314 
3315  Restart_Data.resize(nPointDomain*nFields);
3316  Restart_Vars[2] = nPointDomain;
3317 
3318  int counter = 0;
3319  for (auto iPoint_Global = 0ul; iPoint_Global < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); ++iPoint_Global) {
3320  const auto iPoint = geometry->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global);
3321  if (iPoint >= 0) {
3322  for (auto iVar = 0ul; iVar < nFields; ++iVar)
3323  Restart_Data[counter*nFields+iVar] = SU2_TYPE::GetValue(localVars(iPoint,iVar));
3324  counter++;
3325  }
3326  }
3327 
3328  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3329  cout << "Number of recursions: " << nRecurse << ".\n"
3330  "Elapsed time: " << SU2_MPI::Wtime()-t0 << "s.\n" << endl;
3331  }
3332 }
3333 
3334 void CSolver::Read_SU2_Restart_Metadata(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, bool adjoint, const string& val_filename) const {
3335 
3336  su2double AoA_ = config->GetAoA();
3337  su2double AoS_ = config->GetAoS();
3338  su2double BCThrust_ = config->GetInitial_BCThrust();
3339  su2double dCD_dCL_ = config->GetdCD_dCL();
3340  su2double dCMx_dCL_ = config->GetdCMx_dCL();
3341  su2double dCMy_dCL_ = config->GetdCMy_dCL();
3342  su2double dCMz_dCL_ = config->GetdCMz_dCL();
3343  su2double SPPressureDrop_ = config->GetStreamwise_Periodic_PressureDrop();
3344  string::size_type position;
3345  unsigned long InnerIter_ = 0;
3346  ifstream restart_file;
3347 
3348  /*--- Carry on with ASCII metadata reading. ---*/
3349 
3350  restart_file.open(val_filename.data(), ios::in);
3351  if (restart_file.fail()) {
3352  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3353  cout << " Warning: There is no restart file (" << val_filename.data() << ")."<< endl;
3354  cout << " Computation will continue without updating metadata parameters." << endl;
3355  }
3356  }
3357  else {
3358 
3359  string text_line;
3360 
3361  /*--- Space for extra info (if any) ---*/
3362 
3363  while (getline (restart_file, text_line)) {
3364 
3365  /*--- External iteration ---*/
3366 
3367  position = text_line.find ("ITER=",0);
3368  if (position != string::npos) {
3369  // TODO: 'ITER=' has 5 chars, not 9!
3370  text_line.erase (0,9); InnerIter_ = atoi(text_line.c_str());
3371  }
3372 
3373  /*--- Angle of attack ---*/
3374 
3375  position = text_line.find ("AOA=",0);
3376  if (position != string::npos) {
3377  text_line.erase (0,4); AoA_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3378  }
3379 
3380  /*--- Sideslip angle ---*/
3381 
3382  position = text_line.find ("SIDESLIP_ANGLE=",0);
3383  if (position != string::npos) {
3384  text_line.erase (0,15); AoS_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3385  }
3386 
3387  /*--- BCThrust angle ---*/
3388 
3389  position = text_line.find ("INITIAL_BCTHRUST=",0);
3390  if (position != string::npos) {
3391  text_line.erase (0,17); BCThrust_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3392  }
3393 
3394  /*--- dCD_dCL coefficient ---*/
3395 
3396  position = text_line.find ("DCD_DCL_VALUE=",0);
3397  if (position != string::npos) {
3398  text_line.erase (0,14); dCD_dCL_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3399  }
3400 
3401  /*--- dCMx_dCL coefficient ---*/
3402 
3403  position = text_line.find ("DCMX_DCL_VALUE=",0);
3404  if (position != string::npos) {
3405  text_line.erase (0,15); dCMx_dCL_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3406  }
3407 
3408  /*--- dCMy_dCL coefficient ---*/
3409 
3410  position = text_line.find ("DCMY_DCL_VALUE=",0);
3411  if (position != string::npos) {
3412  text_line.erase (0,15); dCMy_dCL_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3413  }
3414 
3415  /*--- dCMz_dCL coefficient ---*/
3416 
3417  position = text_line.find ("DCMZ_DCL_VALUE=",0);
3418  if (position != string::npos) {
3419  text_line.erase (0,15); dCMz_dCL_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3420  }
3421 
3422  /*--- Streamwise periodic pressure drop for prescribed massflow cases. ---*/
3423 
3424  position = text_line.find ("STREAMWISE_PERIODIC_PRESSURE_DROP=",0);
3425  if (position != string::npos) {
3426  // Erase the name from the line, 'STREAMWISE_PERIODIC_PRESSURE_DROP=' has 34 chars.
3427  text_line.erase (0,34); SPPressureDrop_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3428  }
3429 
3430  }
3431 
3432  /*--- Close the restart meta file. ---*/
3433 
3434  restart_file.close();
3435 
3436  }
3437 
3438 
3439  /*--- Load the metadata. ---*/
3440 
3441  /*--- Angle of attack ---*/
3442 
3443  if (!config->GetDiscard_InFiles()) {
3444  if ((config->GetAoA() != AoA_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE)) {
3445  cout.precision(6);
3446  cout <<"WARNING: AoA in the solution file (" << AoA_ << " deg.) +" << endl;
3447  cout << " AoA offset in mesh file (" << config->GetAoA_Offset() << " deg.) = " << AoA_ + config->GetAoA_Offset() << " deg." << endl;
3448  }
3449  config->SetAoA(AoA_ + config->GetAoA_Offset());
3450  }
3451 
3452  else {
3453  if ((config->GetAoA() != AoA_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3454  cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the AoA in the solution file." << endl;
3455  }
3456 
3457  /*--- Sideslip angle ---*/
3458 
3459  if (!config->GetDiscard_InFiles()) {
3460  if ((config->GetAoS() != AoS_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE)) {
3461  cout.precision(6);
3462  cout <<"WARNING: AoS in the solution file (" << AoS_ << " deg.) +" << endl;
3463  cout << " AoS offset in mesh file (" << config->GetAoS_Offset() << " deg.) = " << AoS_ + config->GetAoS_Offset() << " deg." << endl;
3464  }
3465  config->SetAoS(AoS_ + config->GetAoS_Offset());
3466  }
3467  else {
3468  if ((config->GetAoS() != AoS_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3469  cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the AoS in the solution file." << endl;
3470  }
3471 
3472  /*--- BCThrust ---*/
3473 
3474  if (!config->GetDiscard_InFiles()) {
3475  if ((config->GetInitial_BCThrust() != BCThrust_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3476  cout <<"WARNING: SU2 will use the initial BC Thrust provided in the solution file: " << BCThrust_ << " lbs." << endl;
3477  config->SetInitial_BCThrust(BCThrust_);
3478  }
3479  else {
3480  if ((config->GetInitial_BCThrust() != BCThrust_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3481  cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the BC Thrust in the solution file." << endl;
3482  }
3483 
3484 
3485  if (!config->GetDiscard_InFiles()) {
3486 
3487  if ((config->GetdCD_dCL() != dCD_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3488  cout <<"WARNING: SU2 will use the dCD/dCL provided in the direct solution file: " << dCD_dCL_ << "." << endl;
3489  config->SetdCD_dCL(dCD_dCL_);
3490 
3491  if ((config->GetdCMx_dCL() != dCMx_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3492  cout <<"WARNING: SU2 will use the dCMx/dCL provided in the direct solution file: " << dCMx_dCL_ << "." << endl;
3493  config->SetdCMx_dCL(dCMx_dCL_);
3494 
3495  if ((config->GetdCMy_dCL() != dCMy_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3496  cout <<"WARNING: SU2 will use the dCMy/dCL provided in the direct solution file: " << dCMy_dCL_ << "." << endl;
3497  config->SetdCMy_dCL(dCMy_dCL_);
3498 
3499  if ((config->GetdCMz_dCL() != dCMz_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3500  cout <<"WARNING: SU2 will use the dCMz/dCL provided in the direct solution file: " << dCMz_dCL_ << "." << endl;
3501  config->SetdCMz_dCL(dCMz_dCL_);
3502 
3503  }
3504 
3505  else {
3506 
3507  if ((config->GetdCD_dCL() != dCD_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3508  cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the dCD/dCL in the direct solution file." << endl;
3509 
3510  if ((config->GetdCMx_dCL() != dCMx_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3511  cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the dCMx/dCL in the direct solution file." << endl;
3512 
3513  if ((config->GetdCMy_dCL() != dCMy_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3514  cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the dCMy/dCL in the direct solution file." << endl;
3515 
3516  if ((config->GetdCMz_dCL() != dCMz_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3517  cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the dCMz/dCL in the direct solution file." << endl;
3518 
3519  }
3520 
3521  if (!config->GetDiscard_InFiles()) {
3522  if ((config->GetStreamwise_Periodic_PressureDrop() != SPPressureDrop_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3523  cout <<"WARNING: SU2 will use the STREAMWISE_PERIODIC_PRESSURE_DROP provided in the direct solution file: " << std::setprecision(16) << SPPressureDrop_ << endl;
3524  config->SetStreamwise_Periodic_PressureDrop(SPPressureDrop_);
3525  }
3526  else {
3527  if ((config->GetStreamwise_Periodic_PressureDrop() != SPPressureDrop_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3528  cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the STREAMWISE_PERIODIC_PRESSURE_DROP in the direct solution file." << endl;
3529  }
3530 
3531  /*--- External iteration ---*/
3532 
3533  if ((!config->GetDiscard_InFiles()) && (!adjoint || (adjoint && config->GetRestart())))
3534  config->SetExtIter_OffSet(InnerIter_);
3535 
3536 }
3537 
3538 void CSolver::LoadInletProfile(CGeometry **geometry,
3539  CSolver ***solver,
3540  CConfig *config,
3541  int val_iter,
3542  unsigned short val_kind_solver,
3543  unsigned short val_kind_marker) const {
3544 
3545  /*-- First, set the solver and marker kind for the particular problem at
3546  hand. Note that, in the future, these routines can be used for any solver
3547  and potentially any marker type (beyond inlets). ---*/
3548 
3549  const auto KIND_SOLVER = val_kind_solver;
3550  const auto KIND_MARKER = val_kind_marker;
3551 
3552  const bool time_stepping = (config->GetTime_Marching() == TIME_MARCHING::DT_STEPPING_1ST) ||
3553  (config->GetTime_Marching() == TIME_MARCHING::DT_STEPPING_2ND) ||
3554  (config->GetTime_Marching() == TIME_MARCHING::TIME_STEPPING);
3555 
3556  const auto iZone = config->GetiZone();
3557  const auto nZone = config->GetnZone();
3558 
3559  auto profile_filename = config->GetInlet_FileName();
3560 
3561  const auto turbulence = config->GetKind_Turb_Model() != TURB_MODEL::NONE;
3562  const unsigned short nVar_Turb = turbulence ? solver[MESH_0][TURB_SOL]->GetnVar() : 0;
3563 
3564  const auto species = config->GetKind_Species_Model() != SPECIES_MODEL::NONE;
3565  const unsigned short nVar_Species = species ? solver[MESH_0][SPECIES_SOL]->GetnVar() : 0;
3566 
3567  /*--- names of the columns in the profile ---*/
3568  vector<string> columnNames;
3569  vector<string> columnValues;
3570 
3571  /*--- Count the number of columns that we have for this flow case,
3572  excluding the coordinates. Here, we have 2 entries for the total
3573  conditions or mass flow, another nDim for the direction vector, and
3574  finally entries for the number of turbulence variables. This is only
3575  necessary in case we are writing a template profile file or for Inlet
3576  Interpolation purposes. ---*/
3577 
3578  const unsigned short nCol_InletFile = 2 + nDim + nVar_Turb + nVar_Species;
3579 
3580  /*--- for incompressible flow, we can switch the energy equation off ---*/
3581  /*--- for now, we write the temperature even if we are not using it ---*/
3582  /*--- because a number of routines depend on the presence of the temperature field ---*/
3583  //if (config->GetEnergy_Equation() ==false)
3584  //nCol_InletFile = nCol_InletFile -1;
3585 
3586  /*--- Multizone problems require the number of the zone to be appended. ---*/
3587 
3588  if (nZone > 1)
3589  profile_filename = config->GetMultizone_FileName(profile_filename, iZone, ".dat");
3590 
3591  /*--- Modify file name for an unsteady restart ---*/
3592 
3593  if (time_stepping)
3594  profile_filename = config->GetUnsteady_FileName(profile_filename, val_iter, ".dat");
3595 
3596 
3597  // create vector of column names
3598  for (unsigned short iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3599 
3600  /*--- Skip if this is the wrong type of marker. ---*/
3601  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != KIND_MARKER) continue;
3602 
3603  const string Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
3604 
3605  std::stringstream columnName,columnValue;
3606  columnValue << setprecision(15);
3607  columnValue << std::scientific;
3608 
3609  su2double p_total, t_total;
3610  const su2double* flow_dir = nullptr;
3611 
3612  if (KIND_MARKER == INLET_FLOW) {
3613  p_total = config->GetInletPtotal(Marker_Tag);
3614  t_total = config->GetInletTtotal(Marker_Tag);
3615  flow_dir = config->GetInletFlowDir(Marker_Tag);
3616  } else if (KIND_MARKER == SUPERSONIC_INLET) {
3617  p_total = config->GetInlet_Pressure(Marker_Tag);
3618  t_total = config->GetInlet_Temperature(Marker_Tag);
3619  flow_dir = config->GetInlet_Velocity(Marker_Tag);
3620  } else {
3621  SU2_MPI::Error("Unsupported type of inlet.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3622  }
3623  columnValue << t_total << "\t" << p_total <<"\t";
3624  for (unsigned short iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3625  columnValue << flow_dir[iDim] <<"\t";
3626  }
3627 
3628  columnName << "# COORD-X " << setw(24) << "COORD-Y " << setw(24);
3629  if(nDim==3) columnName << "COORD-Z " << setw(24);
3630 
3631  if (KIND_MARKER == SUPERSONIC_INLET) {
3632  columnName << "TEMPERATURE" << setw(24) << "PRESSURE " << setw(24);
3633  } else if (config->GetKind_Regime() == ENUM_REGIME::COMPRESSIBLE) {
3634  switch (config->GetKind_Inlet()) {
3635  /*--- compressible conditions ---*/
3636  case INLET_TYPE::TOTAL_CONDITIONS:
3637  columnName << "TEMPERATURE" << setw(24) << "PRESSURE " << setw(24);
3638  break;
3639  case INLET_TYPE::MASS_FLOW:
3640  columnName << "DENSITY " << setw(24) << "VELOCITY " << setw(24);
3641  break;
3642  default:
3643  SU2_MPI::Error("Unsupported INLET_TYPE.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3644  break;
3645  }
3646  } else {
3647  switch (config->GetKind_Inc_Inlet(Marker_Tag)) {
3648  /*--- incompressible conditions ---*/
3649  case INLET_TYPE::VELOCITY_INLET:
3650  columnName << "TEMPERATURE" << setw(24) << "VELOCITY " << setw(24);
3651  break;
3652  case INLET_TYPE::PRESSURE_INLET:
3653  columnName << "TEMPERATURE" << setw(24) << "PRESSURE " << setw(24);
3654  break;
3655  default:
3656  SU2_MPI::Error("Unsupported INC_INLET_TYPE.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3657  break;
3658  }
3659  }
3660 
3661  columnName << "NORMAL-X " << setw(24) << "NORMAL-Y " << setw(24);
3662  if(nDim==3) columnName << "NORMAL-Z " << setw(24);
3663 
3664  switch (TurbModelFamily(config->GetKind_Turb_Model())) {
3665  case TURB_FAMILY::NONE: break;
3666  case TURB_FAMILY::SA:
3667  /*--- 1-equation turbulence model: SA ---*/
3668  columnName << "NU_TILDE " << setw(24);
3669  columnValue << config->GetNuFactor_FreeStream() * config->GetViscosity_FreeStream() / config->GetDensity_FreeStream() <<"\t";
3670  break;
3671  case TURB_FAMILY::KW:
3672  /*--- 2-equation turbulence model (SST) ---*/
3673  columnName << "TKE " << setw(24) << "DISSIPATION" << setw(24);
3674  columnValue << config->GetTke_FreeStream() << "\t" << config->GetOmega_FreeStream() <<"\t";
3675  break;
3676  }
3677 
3678  switch (config->GetKind_Species_Model()) {
3679  case SPECIES_MODEL::NONE: break;
3680  case SPECIES_MODEL::SPECIES_TRANSPORT:
3681  for (unsigned short iVar = 0; iVar < nVar_Species; iVar++) {
3682  columnName << "SPECIES_" + std::to_string(iVar) + " " << setw(24);
3683  columnValue << config->GetInlet_SpeciesVal(Marker_Tag)[iVar] << "\t";
3684  }
3685  break;
3686  case SPECIES_MODEL::FLAMELET:
3687  /*--- 2-equation flamelet model ---*/
3688  columnName << "PROGRESSVAR" << setw(24) << "ENTHALPYTOT" << setw(24);
3689  columnValue << config->GetInlet_SpeciesVal(Marker_Tag)[0] << "\t" << config->GetInlet_SpeciesVal(Marker_Tag)[1]<<"\t";
3690  /*--- auxiliary species transport equations ---*/
3691  for (unsigned short iReactant = 0; iReactant < config->GetNUserScalars(); iReactant++) {
3692  columnName << config->GetUserScalarName(iReactant) << setw(24);
3693  columnValue << config->GetInlet_SpeciesVal(Marker_Tag)[config->GetNControlVars() + iReactant] << "\t";
3694  }
3695  break;
3696  }
3697 
3698  columnNames.push_back(columnName.str());
3699  columnValues.push_back(columnValue.str());
3700 
3701  }
3702 
3703  /*--- There are no markers of this type. ---*/
3704 
3705  const unsigned short has_names = !columnNames.empty();
3706  unsigned short any_has_names;
3707  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&has_names, &any_has_names, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_SHORT, MPI_MAX, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
3708  if (!any_has_names) return;
3709 
3710  /*--- Read the profile data from an ASCII file. ---*/
3711 
3712  CMarkerProfileReaderFVM profileReader(geometry[MESH_0], config, profile_filename, KIND_MARKER, nCol_InletFile, columnNames, columnValues);
3713 
3714  /*--- Load data from the restart into correct containers. ---*/
3715 
3716  unsigned long Marker_Counter = 0;
3717  unsigned short local_failure = 0;
3718 
3719  const su2double tolerance = config->GetInlet_Profile_Matching_Tolerance();
3720 
3721  for (auto iMarker = 0ul; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3722 
3723  /*--- Skip if this is the wrong type of marker. ---*/
3724 
3725  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != KIND_MARKER) continue;
3726 
3727  /*--- Get tag in order to identify the correct inlet data. ---*/
3728 
3729  const auto Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
3730 
3731  for (auto jMarker = 0ul; jMarker < profileReader.GetNumberOfProfiles(); jMarker++) {
3732 
3733  /*--- If we have not found the matching marker string, continue to next marker. ---*/
3734 
3735  if (profileReader.GetTagForProfile(jMarker) != Marker_Tag) continue;
3736 
3737  /*--- Increment our counter for marker matches. ---*/
3738 
3739  Marker_Counter++;
3740 
3741  /*--- Get data for this profile. ---*/
3742 
3743  const vector<passivedouble>& Inlet_Data = profileReader.GetDataForProfile(jMarker);
3744  const auto nColumns = profileReader.GetNumberOfColumnsInProfile(jMarker);
3745  vector<su2double> Inlet_Data_Interpolated ((nCol_InletFile+nDim)*geometry[MESH_0]->nVertex[iMarker]);
3746 
3747  /*--- Define Inlet Values vectors before and after interpolation (if needed) ---*/
3748  vector<su2double> Inlet_Values(nCol_InletFile+nDim);
3749  vector<su2double> Inlet_Interpolated(nColumns);
3750 
3751  const auto nRows = profileReader.GetNumberOfRowsInProfile(jMarker);
3752 
3753  /*--- Pointer to call Set and Evaluate functions. ---*/
3754  vector<C1DInterpolation*> interpolator(nColumns,nullptr);
3755  string interpolation_function, interpolation_type;
3756 
3757  /*--- Define the reference for interpolation. ---*/
3758  unsigned short radius_index=0;
3759  vector<su2double> InletRadii = profileReader.GetColumnForProfile(jMarker, radius_index);
3760  vector<su2double> Interpolation_Column (nRows);
3761 
3762  bool Interpolate = true;
3763 
3764  switch(config->GetKindInletInterpolationFunction()){
3765 
3766  case (INLET_SPANWISE_INTERP::NONE):
3767  Interpolate = false;
3768  break;
3769 
3770  case (INLET_SPANWISE_INTERP::AKIMA_1D):
3771  for (auto iCol=0ul; iCol < nColumns; iCol++){
3772  Interpolation_Column = profileReader.GetColumnForProfile(jMarker, iCol);
3773  interpolator[iCol] = new CAkimaInterpolation(InletRadii,Interpolation_Column);
3774  }
3775  interpolation_function = "AKIMA";
3776  break;
3777 
3778  case (INLET_SPANWISE_INTERP::LINEAR_1D):
3779  for (auto iCol=0ul; iCol < nColumns; iCol++){
3780  Interpolation_Column = profileReader.GetColumnForProfile(jMarker, iCol);
3781  interpolator[iCol] = new CLinearInterpolation(InletRadii,Interpolation_Column);
3782  }
3783  interpolation_function = "LINEAR";
3784  break;
3785 
3786  case (INLET_SPANWISE_INTERP::CUBIC_1D):
3787  for (auto iCol=0ul; iCol < nColumns; iCol++){
3788  Interpolation_Column = profileReader.GetColumnForProfile(jMarker, iCol);
3789  interpolator[iCol] = new CCubicSpline(InletRadii,Interpolation_Column);
3790  }
3791  interpolation_function = "CUBIC";
3792  break;
3793 
3794  default:
3795  SU2_MPI::Error("Unknown type of interpolation function for inlets.\n",CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3796  break;
3797  }
3798 
3799  if (Interpolate){
3800  switch(config->GetKindInletInterpolationType()){
3801  case(INLET_INTERP_TYPE::VR_VTHETA):
3802  interpolation_type="VR_VTHETA";
3803  break;
3804  case(INLET_INTERP_TYPE::ALPHA_PHI):
3805  interpolation_type="ALPHA_PHI";
3806  break;
3807  }
3808  cout<<"Inlet Interpolation being done using "<<interpolation_function
3809  <<" function and type "<<interpolation_type<<" for "<< Marker_Tag<<endl;
3810  if(nDim == 3)
3811  cout<<"Ensure the flow direction is in z direction"<<endl;
3812  else if (nDim == 2)
3813  cout<<"Ensure the flow direction is in x direction"<<endl;
3814  }
3815  else {
3816  cout<<"No Inlet Interpolation being used"<<endl;
3817  }
3818 
3819  /*--- Loop through the nodes on this marker. ---*/
3820 
3821  for (auto iVertex = 0ul; iVertex < geometry[MESH_0]->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3822 
3823  const auto iPoint = geometry[MESH_0]->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3824  const auto Coord = geometry[MESH_0]->nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
3825 
3826  if (!Interpolate) {
3827 
3828  su2double min_dist = 1e16;
3829 
3830  /*--- Find the distance to the closest point in our inlet profile data. ---*/
3831 
3832  for (auto iRow = 0ul; iRow < nRows; iRow++) {
3833 
3834  /*--- Get the coords for this data point. ---*/
3835 
3836  const auto index = iRow*nColumns;
3837 
3838  const auto dist = GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord, &Inlet_Data[index]);
3839 
3840  /*--- Check is this is the closest point and store data if so. ---*/
3841 
3842  if (dist < min_dist) {
3843  min_dist = dist;
3844  for (auto iVar = 0ul; iVar < nColumns; iVar++)
3845  Inlet_Values[iVar] = Inlet_Data[index+iVar];
3846  }
3847 
3848  }
3849 
3850  /*--- If the diff is less than the tolerance, match the two.
3851  We could modify this to simply use the nearest neighbor, or
3852  eventually add something more elaborate here for interpolation. ---*/
3853 
3854  if (min_dist < tolerance) {
3855 
3856  solver[MESH_0][KIND_SOLVER]->SetInletAtVertex(Inlet_Values.data(), iMarker, iVertex);
3857 
3858  } else {
3859 
3860  unsigned long GlobalIndex = geometry[MESH_0]->nodes->GetGlobalIndex(iPoint);
3861  cout << "WARNING: Did not find a match between the points in the inlet file\n";
3862  cout << "and point " << GlobalIndex;
3863  cout << std::scientific;
3864  cout << " at location: [" << Coord[0] << ", " << Coord[1];
3865  if (nDim==3) cout << ", " << Coord[2];
3866  cout << "]\n";
3867  cout << "Distance to closest point: " << min_dist << "\n";
3868  cout << "Current tolerance: " << tolerance << "\n\n";
3869  cout << "You can increase the tolerance for point matching by changing the value\n";
3870  cout << "of the option INLET_MATCHING_TOLERANCE in your *.cfg file." << endl;
3871  local_failure++;
3872  break;
3873  }
3874 
3875  }
3876  else { // Interpolate
3877 
3878  /* --- Calculating the radius and angle of the vertex ---*/
3879  /* --- Flow should be in z direction for 3D cases ---*/
3880  /* --- Or in x direction for 2D cases ---*/
3881  const su2double Interp_Radius = sqrt(pow(Coord[0],2)+ pow(Coord[1],2));
3882  const su2double Theta = atan2(Coord[1],Coord[0]);
3883 
3884  /* --- Evaluating and saving the final spline data ---*/
3885  for (auto iVar=0ul; iVar < nColumns; iVar++){
3886 
3887  /*---Evaluate spline will get the respective value of the Data set (column) specified
3888  for that interpolator[iVar], cycling through all columns to get all the
3889  data for that vertex ---*/
3890  Inlet_Interpolated[iVar]=interpolator[iVar]->EvaluateSpline(Interp_Radius);
3891  if (Interp_Radius < InletRadii.front() || Interp_Radius > InletRadii.back()) {
3892  cout << "WARNING: Did not find a match between the radius in the inlet file " ;
3893  cout << std::scientific;
3894  cout << "at location: [" << Coord[0] << ", " << Coord[1];
3895  if (nDim == 3) {cout << ", " << Coord[2];}
3896  cout << "]";
3897  cout << " with Radius: "<< Interp_Radius << endl;
3898  cout << "You can add a row for Radius: " << Interp_Radius <<" in the inlet file ";
3899  cout << "to eliminate this issue or give proper data" << endl;
3900  local_failure++;
3901  break;
3902  }
3903  }
3904 
3905  /*--- Correcting for Interpolation Type ---*/
3906 
3907  Inlet_Values = CorrectedInletValues(Inlet_Interpolated, Theta, nDim, Coord,
3908  nVar_Turb, config->GetKindInletInterpolationType());
3909 
3910  solver[MESH_0][KIND_SOLVER]->SetInletAtVertex(Inlet_Values.data(), iMarker, iVertex);
3911 
3912  for (unsigned short iVar=0; iVar < (nCol_InletFile+nDim); iVar++)
3913  Inlet_Data_Interpolated[iVertex*(nCol_InletFile+nDim)+iVar] = Inlet_Values[iVar];
3914 
3915  }
3916 
3917  } // end iVertex loop
3918 
3919  if (config->GetPrintInlet_InterpolatedData()) {
3920  PrintInletInterpolatedData(Inlet_Data_Interpolated, profileReader.GetTagForProfile(jMarker),
3921  geometry[MESH_0]->nVertex[iMarker], nDim, nCol_InletFile+nDim);
3922  }
3923 
3924  for (auto& interp : interpolator) delete interp;
3925 
3926  } // end jMarker loop
3927 
3928  if (local_failure > 0) break;
3929 
3930  } // end iMarker loop
3931 
3932  unsigned short global_failure;
3933  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&local_failure, &global_failure, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_SHORT, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
3934 
3935  if (global_failure > 0) {
3936  SU2_MPI::Error("Prescribed inlet data does not match markers within tolerance.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3937  }
3938 
3939  /*--- Copy the inlet data down to the coarse levels if multigrid is active.
3940  Here, we use a face area-averaging to restrict the values. ---*/
3941 
3942  for (auto iMesh = 1u; iMesh <= config->GetnMGLevels(); iMesh++) {
3943  for (auto iMarker = 0u; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3944  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == KIND_MARKER) {
3945 
3946  const auto Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
3947 
3948  /*--- Check the number of columns and allocate temp array. ---*/
3949 
3950  unsigned short nColumns = 0;
3951  for (auto jMarker = 0ul; jMarker < profileReader.GetNumberOfProfiles(); jMarker++) {
3952  if (profileReader.GetTagForProfile(jMarker) == Marker_Tag) {
3953  nColumns = profileReader.GetNumberOfColumnsInProfile(jMarker);
3954  break;
3955  }
3956  }
3957  vector<su2double> Inlet_Values(nColumns);
3958  vector<su2double> Inlet_Fine(nColumns);
3959 
3960  /*--- Loop through the nodes on this marker. ---*/
3961 
3962  for (auto iVertex = 0ul; iVertex < geometry[iMesh]->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3963 
3964  /*--- Get the coarse mesh point and compute the boundary area. ---*/
3965 
3966  const auto iPoint = geometry[iMesh]->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3967  const auto Normal = geometry[iMesh]->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
3968  const su2double Area_Parent = GeometryToolbox::Norm(nDim, Normal);
3969 
3970  /*--- Reset the values for the coarse point. ---*/
3971 
3972  for (auto& v : Inlet_Values) v = 0.0;
3973 
3974  /*-- Loop through the children and extract the inlet values
3975  from those nodes that lie on the boundary as well as their
3976  boundary area. We build a face area-averaged value for the
3977  coarse point values from the fine grid points. Note that
3978  children from the interior volume will not be included in
3979  the averaging. ---*/
3980 
3981  for (auto iChildren = 0u; iChildren < geometry[iMesh]->nodes->GetnChildren_CV(iPoint); iChildren++) {
3982  const auto Area_Children =
3983  solver[iMesh-1][KIND_SOLVER]->GetInletAtVertex(iMarker, iVertex, geometry[iMesh-1], Inlet_Fine.data());
3984  for (auto iVar = 0u; iVar < nColumns; iVar++)
3985  Inlet_Values[iVar] += Inlet_Fine[iVar] * Area_Children / Area_Parent;
3986  }
3987 
3988  /*--- Set the boundary area-averaged inlet values for the coarse point. ---*/
3989 
3990  solver[iMesh][KIND_SOLVER]->SetInletAtVertex(Inlet_Values.data(), iMarker, iVertex);
3991 
3992  }
3993  }
3994  }
3995  }
3996 
3997 }

4000 void CSolver::ComputeVertexTractions(CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config){
4001 
4002  const bool viscous_flow = config->GetViscous();
4003  const su2double Pressure_Inf = config->GetPressure_FreeStreamND();
4004 
4005  for (auto iMarker = 0u; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
4006 
4007  /*--- If this is defined as a wall ---*/
4008  if (!config->GetSolid_Wall(iMarker)) continue;
4009 
4010  // Loop over the vertices
4011  for (auto iVertex = 0ul; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
4012 
4013  // Recover the point index
4014  const auto iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4015 
4016  su2double auxForce[3] = {0.0};
4017 
4018  // Check if the node belongs to the domain (i.e, not a halo node).
4019  if (geometry->nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) {
4020 
4021  // Get the normal at the vertex: this normal goes inside the fluid domain.
4022  const su2double* Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
4023 
4024  // Retrieve the values of pressure
4025  const su2double Pn = base_nodes->GetPressure(iPoint);
4026 
4027  // Calculate tn in the fluid nodes for the inviscid term --> Units of force (non-dimensional).
4028  for (unsigned short iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4029  auxForce[iDim] = -(Pn-Pressure_Inf)*Normal[iDim];
4030 
4031  // Calculate tn in the fluid nodes for the viscous term
4032  if (viscous_flow) {
4033  const su2double Viscosity = base_nodes->GetLaminarViscosity(iPoint);
4034  su2double Tau[3][3];
4035  CNumerics::ComputeStressTensor(nDim, Tau, base_nodes->GetVelocityGradient(iPoint), Viscosity);
4036  for (unsigned short iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4037  auxForce[iDim] += GeometryToolbox::DotProduct(nDim, Tau[iDim], Normal);
4038  }
4039  }
4040  }
4041 
4042  // Redimensionalize the forces (Lref is 1, thus only Pref is needed).
4043  for (unsigned short iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4044  VertexTraction[iMarker][iVertex][iDim] = config->GetPressure_Ref() * auxForce[iDim];
4045  }
4046  }
4047  }
4048 
4049 }

4051 void CSolver::RegisterVertexTractions(CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config){
4052 
4053  unsigned short iMarker, iDim;
4054  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
4055 
4056  /*--- Loop over all the markers ---*/
4057  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
4058 
4059  /*--- If this is defined as a wall ---*/
4060  if (!config->GetSolid_Wall(iMarker)) continue;
4061 
4062  /*--- Loop over the vertices ---*/
4063  SU2_OMP_FOR_STAT(OMP_MIN_SIZE)
4064  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
4065 
4066  /*--- Recover the point index ---*/
4067  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4068 
4069  /*--- Check if the node belongs to the domain (i.e, not a halo node) ---*/
4070  if (!geometry->nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) continue;
4071 
4072  /*--- Register the vertex traction as output ---*/
4073  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4074  AD::RegisterOutput(VertexTraction[iMarker][iVertex][iDim]);
4075  }
4076  }
4077  END_SU2_OMP_FOR
4078  }
4079

4153 void CSolver::ComputeResidual_Multizone(const CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config){
4154 
4155  SU2_OMP_PARALLEL {
4156 
4157  /*--- Set Residuals to zero ---*/
4158  SU2_OMP_MASTER
4159  for (unsigned short iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++){
4160  Residual_BGS[iVar] = 0.0;
4161  Residual_Max_BGS[iVar] = 0.0;
4162  }
4163  END_SU2_OMP_MASTER
4164 
4165  vector<su2double> resMax(nVar,0.0), resRMS(nVar,0.0);
4166  vector<const su2double*> coordMax(nVar,nullptr);
4167  vector<unsigned long> idxMax(nVar,0);
4168 
4169  /*--- Set the residuals and BGSSolution_k to solution for next multizone outer iteration. ---*/
4170  SU2_OMP_FOR_STAT(roundUpDiv(nPoint,2*omp_get_num_threads()))
4171  for (unsigned long iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4172  const su2double domain = (iPoint < nPointDomain);
4173  for (unsigned short iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
4174  const su2double Res = (base_nodes->Get_BGSSolution(iPoint,iVar) - base_nodes->Get_BGSSolution_k(iPoint,iVar))*domain;
4175 
4176  /*--- Update residual information for current thread. ---*/
4177  resRMS[iVar] += Res*Res;
4178  if (fabs(Res) > resMax[iVar]) {
4179  resMax[iVar] = fabs(Res);
4180  idxMax[iVar] = iPoint;
4181  coordMax[iVar] = geometry->nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
4182  }
4183  }
4184  }
4185  END_SU2_OMP_FOR
4186 
4187  /*--- Reduce residual information over all threads in this rank. ---*/
4188  SU2_OMP_CRITICAL
4189  for (unsigned short iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
4190  Residual_BGS[iVar] += resRMS[iVar];
4191  AddRes_Max_BGS(iVar, resMax[iVar], geometry->nodes->GetGlobalIndex(idxMax[iVar]), coordMax[iVar]);
4192  }
4193  END_SU2_OMP_CRITICAL
4194  SU2_OMP_BARRIER
4195 
4196  SetResidual_BGS(geometry, config);
4197 
4198  }
4199  END_SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
4200 }

4202 void CSolver::BasicLoadRestart(CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config, const string& filename, unsigned long skipVars) {
4203 
4204  /*--- Read and store the restart metadata. ---*/
4205 
4206 // Read_SU2_Restart_Metadata(geometry[MESH_0], config, true, filename);
4207 
4208  /*--- Read the restart data from either an ASCII or binary SU2 file. ---*/
4209 
4210  if (config->GetRead_Binary_Restart()) {
4211  Read_SU2_Restart_Binary(geometry, config, filename);
4212  } else {
4213  Read_SU2_Restart_ASCII(geometry, config, filename);
4214  }
4215 
4216  /*--- Load data from the restart into correct containers. ---*/
4217 
4218  unsigned long iPoint_Global_Local = 0;
4219 
4220  for (auto iPoint_Global = 0ul; iPoint_Global < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); iPoint_Global++ ) {
4221 
4222  /*--- Retrieve local index. If this node from the restart file lives
4223  on the current processor, we will load and instantiate the vars. ---*/
4224 
4225  const auto iPoint_Local = geometry->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global);
4226 
4227  if (iPoint_Local > -1) {
4228 
4229  /*--- We need to store this point's data, so jump to the correct
4230  offset in the buffer of data from the restart file and load it. ---*/
4231 
4232  const auto index = iPoint_Global_Local*Restart_Vars[1] + skipVars;
4233 
4234  for (auto iVar = 0u; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
4235  base_nodes->SetSolution(iPoint_Local, iVar, Restart_Data[index+iVar]);
4236  }
4237 
4238  iPoint_Global_Local++;
4239  }
4240 
4241  }
4242 
4243  /*--- Delete the class memory that is used to load the restart. ---*/
4244 
4245  Restart_Vars = decltype(Restart_Vars){};
4246  Restart_Data = decltype(Restart_Data){};
4247 
4248  /*--- Detect a wrong solution file ---*/
4249 
4250  if (iPoint_Global_Local != nPointDomain) {
4251  SU2_MPI::Error(string("The solution file ") + filename + string(" doesn't match with the mesh file!\n") +
4252  string("It could be empty lines at the end of the file."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4253  }
4254 }

4256 void CSolver::SavelibROM(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, bool converged) {
4257 
4258 #if defined(HAVE_LIBROM) && !defined(CODI_FORWARD_TYPE) && !defined(CODI_REVERSE_TYPE)
4259  const bool unsteady = config->GetTime_Domain();
4260  const string filename = config->GetlibROMbase_FileName();
4261  const unsigned long TimeIter = config->GetTimeIter();
4262  const unsigned long nTimeIter = config->GetnTime_Iter();
4263  const int maxBasisDim = config->GetMax_BasisDim();
4264  const int save_freq = config->GetRom_SaveFreq();
4265  int dim = int(nPointDomain * nVar);
4266  bool incremental = false;
4267 
4268  if (!u_basis_generator) {
4269 
4270  /*--- Define SVD basis generator ---*/
4271  auto timesteps = static_cast<int>(nTimeIter - TimeIter);
4272  CAROM::Options svd_options = CAROM::Options(dim, timesteps, -1,
4273  false, true).setMaxBasisDimension(int(maxBasisDim));
4274 
4275  if (config->GetKind_PODBasis() == POD_KIND::STATIC) {
4276  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) std::cout << "Creating static basis generator." << std::endl;
4277 
4278  if (unsteady) {
4279  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) std::cout << "Incremental basis generator recommended for unsteady simulations." << std::endl;
4280  }
4281  }
4282  else {
4283  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) std::cout << "Creating incremental basis generator." << std::endl;
4284 
4285  svd_options.setIncrementalSVD(1.0e-3, config->GetDelta_UnstTime(),
4286  1.0e-2, config->GetDelta_UnstTime()*nTimeIter, true).setDebugMode(false);
4287  incremental = true;
4288  }
4289 
4290  u_basis_generator.reset(new CAROM::BasisGenerator(
4291  svd_options, incremental,
4292  filename));
4293 
4294  // Save mesh ordering
4295  std::ofstream f;
4296  f.open(filename + "_mesh_" + to_string(rank) + ".csv");
4297  for (unsigned long iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
4298  unsigned long globalPoint = geometry->nodes->GetGlobalIndex(iPoint);
4299  auto Coord = geometry->nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
4300 
4301  for (unsigned long iDim; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4302  f << Coord[iDim] << ", ";
4303  }
4304  f << globalPoint << "\n";
4305  }
4306  f.close();
4307  }
4308 
4309  if (unsteady && (TimeIter % save_freq == 0)) {
4310  // give solution and time steps to libROM:
4311  su2double dt = config->GetDelta_UnstTime();
4312  su2double t = config->GetCurrent_UnstTime();
4313  u_basis_generator->takeSample(const_cast<su2double*>(base_nodes->GetSolution().data()), t, dt);
4314  }
4315 
4316  /*--- End collection of data and save POD ---*/
4317 
4318  if (converged) {
4319 
4320  if (!unsteady) {
4321  // dt is different for each node, so just use a placeholder dt
4322  su2double dt = base_nodes->GetDelta_Time(0);
4323  su2double t = dt*TimeIter;
4324  u_basis_generator->takeSample(const_cast<su2double*>(base_nodes->GetSolution().data()), t, dt);
4325  }
4326 
4327  if (config->GetKind_PODBasis() == POD_KIND::STATIC) {
4328  u_basis_generator->writeSnapshot();
4329  }
4330 
4331  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) std::cout << "Computing SVD" << std::endl;
4332  int rom_dim = u_basis_generator->getSpatialBasis()->numColumns();
4333 
4334  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) std::cout << "Basis dimension: " << rom_dim << std::endl;
4335  u_basis_generator->endSamples();
4336 
4337  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) std::cout << "ROM Sampling ended" << std::endl;
4338  }
4339 
4340 #else
4341  SU2_MPI::Error("SU2 was not compiled with libROM support.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4342 #endif
4343 
4344 }
